name: AGEAGLE AERIAL SYSTEMS
description: Commercial drone technology, services and solutions
sampleDescriptions: Support public policy that leverages innovative aviation technology for defense and commercial applications.
Support public policy that leverages innovative aviation technology for defense and commercial applications.
Support public policy that leverages innovative aviation technology for defense and commercial applications; unmanned aircraft systems for infrastructure inspections.
Department of Defense Innovation Unit Blue unmanned aircraft system (UAS) approved list; the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 (H.R. 4350).
Use of unmanned aircraft systems for infrastructure applications in the implementation of the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (H.R. 3684).
